original: 《 官職 》武將可以透過內政工作或參加征戰獲得經驗。隨著等級提升可敘任較高品階的官職，以提升出征部隊數與帶兵量。惟官職要給付俸祿，過多無用的高階將領，對百姓負擔甚重…
text: "Official position" generals can gain experience through internal affairs or participating in battles. As the level increases, you can assume higher-ranking official positions to increase the number of troops on the expedition and the number of troops. But the official position must pay salaries. Too many useless high-ranking generals have a heavy burden on the people...
